Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

Dear [Customer's Name],

I hope this message finds you well and savoring each delightful moment! I’m Robert Simmons, and as the loyalty program manager here at Delphi's Delights, I have some important news for you regarding your rewards points.

Your rewards points balance currently stands at an impressive 3,500 points. However, a portion of these points is set to expire in just 3 days! We want to ensure you make the most of your well-earned perks before they vanish.

Imagine sipping on Persephone’s Pomegranate Tea or indulging in a cup of Aphrodite’s Rose Latte, both perfect ways to spend your points. Of course, if you'd prefer a classic choice, Hades' Dark Roast Coffee is always a great pick. Each of these options offers a unique delight that captures the essence of our offerings. 

To redeem your points or explore more options, simply click on our [Rewards Portal] and make your selection before time runs out.

Rest assured, I’m here to help and make your experience at Delphi's Delights as wonderful as possible. If you have any questions or need assistance with your account, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

Warm regards,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi's Delights
